issue.title: collider.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://collider.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcollider.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @troymcd > Web site detects AdGuard and will not display content. this blocker looks almost identical to one I reported yesterday on cbr.com. the filter has already been updated and cbr.com now works, but collider.com still does not. I have double checked all the settings both on this tablet and my phone with the same result. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ea313jjpmd4wkskwk4g44okcsow4s043b4f6nom6x4.jpg?nc=1)

filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

issue.body:

issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks – Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots

issue.title: foxsports.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.151

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.foxsports.com/stories/mlb/shohei-ohtani-injury-updates-from-ben-verlander

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/d43efa79-6c0b-47f2-90c1-f5ca97ce0e2e)


</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
